body.name: WLIVE Dresser for Bedroom with 4 Drawers, Nightstand, Chest of Drawers, Tall Dresser Drawers with Sturdy Metal Frame for Hallway, Living Room, Closet, Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 20 hrs 59 mins
features: 【Modern Design】The dresser with 4 drawers is very suitable for various occasions such as office, bedroom and kitchen. It can be used not only as a dress organizer/nightstand but also as an accent locker in the living room.

【Stable & Durable】The superior particle wood panel and sturdy steel frame are used for construction to maintain stability. The superior panel not only increases durability, but also can resist water and scratches. The smooth surface is easy to clean without any smell. The elevated base prevents moisture damage. The steel frame with rubber feet can protecting the ground.

【Large Storage Space】The storage organizer unit has 4 drawers, which can meet all your storage needs. They can be neatly placed inside to help you sort items by type, and keep all items and accessories in order, and you can save a lot of time when picking up items. The wooden top can withstand up to 88 pounds, providing a hard surface for placing lamps, books, decorations, etc.
【Easy Assembly】Overall dimension: 21.3"W*14.2"D*32.8"H; Easy to assemble with detailed instruction and tools in the package. Please feel free to contact us if you have any question.

【Elaborate Production】Each drawer is equipped with metal handle and slide rail, which can help you pull the drawer out smoothly without making noise. The slide rail allows all drawers to align with it, while ensuring that the drawers do not fall off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's good for what it is, but know what it is
reviews.reviewText: Is it all wood? Yes, particle board. Does it looks pretty good? Yes. Is it inexpensive for what you get? Also yes.That said, know what you're buying.This is pretty much a nick-knack set of drawers. It's small. It's great if you have a bunch of loose things that you want to organize. That is what I bought it for. Arts and crafts stuff, electrical cords, and other random things.If you're looking for a clothing drawer, it's not really going to work. There just isn't a lot of space.It's cheap because it's small, but it's not offensively, small. It is functional. I give it 5 stars based on value for money. It's sturdy when assembled correctly. DO NOT expect fancy furniture though.It also takes probably a good 2-3 hours to put together, so be prepared for that.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It will do!
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to put together. It’s nice looking. It’s on the smaller side. If you have a small room, it’s a great option. I gave it four stars because the drawers could be more sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The directions are awful, but….
reviews.reviewText: The reviews that mention the terrible directions are spot on. That being said, from start to finish, this took me under three hours to put together. I made one mistake, but it was quickly remedied. Unsolicited advice: Check the tracks on the drawers as you go. Don’t assembly them all first.Many reviews mention using a drill, but with the exception of anchoring it to the wall, that feels super unnecessary to me. I did it all with a Phillips head.It is much smaller than I anticipated, but that’s on me for not double checking. It’s pretty and seems durable. Overall, I think it’s a win.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Caution when buying
reviews.reviewText: The instructions to put the dresser together are unclear, but you can figure it out. The dresser is sturdy, and I don’t have a major issue with it. The biggest issue is that the dresser comes with a big sticker that is on the top of the dresser. This was not in any images of the product, and looked very bad when I put the dresser together. After removing the sticker, the dresser is covered in adhesive residue, which has been nearly impossible to completely remove. The top of the dresser looks horrible because of this, and remains very sticky. I have purchased Goo gone and will try that out, but this dresser is far more trouble than it is worth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small but sturdy
reviews.reviewText: Well made but smaller than you’d expect. The seller reached out to address my concerns in a positive way so I’d say they are definitely attentive to concerns

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best assembly instructions!
reviews.reviewText: When I opened the box I was initially concerned about putting together so many pieces and parts. However this item had the best instructions that exactly matched the parts! Every screw lined up so the assembly was not hard. It took me awhile to assemble myself. The chest is sturdy and a perfect fit for the closet space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars We like it.
reviews.reviewText: Well made. Sturdy. Looks very nice. Does need to be put together and best to have two people doing it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty good purchase for the money but it could have been a little bigger
reviews.reviewText: This is a pretty good dresser but its a tad on the small size. In the future I will probably move this into my office as more of a small misc item storage rather than a dresser. The unit itself is pretty sturdy but the base itself could be a bit higher quality.
